q: He also wants to see Barack Obama take steps to reduce the deficit by closing loopholes in corporate tax laws and reducing unnecessary defense spending before considering cuts to education, health care or Social Security. I hope the president makes it clear that as we go forward in terms of deficit reduction, we don't do it on the backs of the middle class or the most vulnerable people in this country, Sen. Don't come here just to complain about my behavior, Jaime Bayly says angrily over the outro music.`` And don't be so damn boring.'' Jaime Bayly is a man of many parts.
